credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Competition Design for La Fenice, Venice: Transverse Section
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli (1845-1926), Rome: Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and gray wash, watercolor, graphite on cream paper
description: Drawing in shades of rose and gray of transverse section of a theater showing a large central section with a pitched roof flanked by bays with lower roof.   View of five tiers of boxes topped by a shallow dome, the proscenium with curtain, and a large dark semicircular shape seen through the roofing timbers.  The rose pink indicates structural supports.
name: Drawing
